entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Drifting snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Occasional drifting snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
